attributes.action: Make all e-Petition Debates Free Votes
attributes.additional_details:
Given that we the public are asking for a debate, though these petitions, often on subject that none of the three main parties want a debate on, the debate must not be subjected to any party interference.

Having seen the recent EU debate with 3 line whips imposed on our debate by the main parties, we the public need to send a strong message that these are our debates and are not to be crushed by the establishment.

rejection.details: Whipping is a matter for political parties and not HM Government.
